t: Amazon
s: However, if you use UPS the buyer may be faced with an outrageous fee from UPS just for collecting money from them (years ago is was $50 -- more now). The buyer might not object to paying the duties, but strongly objects (and rightly so) to paying the carrier a large sum for taking their money.
